result.execSummary:
Geoffrey Adam McCloskey was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Geoffrey Adam McCloskey was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Geoffrey Adam McCloskey

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Bail/bond hearing on July 14, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: HWC, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Michael Nieskes,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski,  DF:  Geoffrey Adam McCloskey appeared from jail.  ADA Nieskes states PO hold has been dropped and can now be extradited to Minnesota.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 14, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
Bail/bond hearing on July 8, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Michael E Nieskes & Hannah Wrobel,  DF ATTY:  Brian T Smestad,  DF:  Geoffrey Adam McCloskey appeared from jail. Minnesota has not picked Defendant up thus far and he is still on a PO hold (from Colorado).  Atty Smestad recommends a signature bond.  Court holds Defendant without bond.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 8, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
SRN and Defendant signed this date. eif
Bail/bond hearing on July 3, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Alexis S Mckinley,  DF:  Geoffrey Adam McCloskey appeared from jail pro se. Defendant did not want to speak to the PD.  Court confirms address. Defendant has a felony warrant out of Hennepin County MN.  Defendant would like to represent himself. Court questions Defendant. Court notes defendant is competent to represent himself today. Court directs Defendant be held without bail.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for July 3, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
